nodes.text: Hyllis was a Sergeant in the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps. During the Iron Blockade, in which Imperial Governor Ubrik Adelhard blockaded the entire Anoat sector, Hyllis was stationed in a small garrison on the planet Mataou within the sector. Sergeant Hyllis was killed when a young smuggler attacked the garrison in order to create a distraction for the criminal Trade Spine League to sneak a ship through the blockade. The sergeant wore stormtrooper armor with an orange pauldron and carried a blaster rifle.
Hyllis first appeared as a boss enemy in the video game Star Wars: Uprising, which was released on mobile platforms in 2015.
